members.name: update
members.comment: Called once per frame to update all components.

members.name: shutdown
members.comment: Called when the game is shutting down, to shutdown all components.

members.comment:
Create a property that can be marked as dirty.

 		dirtyProp =		Name of the property to mark dirty.
